text: All, I just did a re-write of the animations that I think improves things a lot. When you have minute can you take a look at our staging site <http://staging.uncorkedstudios.com/ucs-wearables> ?

attachments.title: Tracking Progress: Wearables In Review
attachments.text: A research project on and health- and activity-tracking wearable devices by Uncorked Studios, a digital product agency in Portland, Oregon.
attachments.fallback: Uncorked Studios: Tracking Progress: Wearables In Review

text: We now have 2 animations, 1 for desktop and another for mobile given that we have different hero image sizes for each. Let me know what you think.

This is looking so good! Even on mobile! I am noticing thereâ€™s an abrupt cutout of the body copy just after it starts floating up and before it goes off screen.  I notice it most when going from Approach to Key Learnings.
i wish there was an emoticon for fist-pumping
